attributes.action: Free Schengen Tourist Visa for Indian citizen with UK Indefinite Leave To Remain
attributes.additional_details: The visa cost for a couple is 140 £ and I have heard stories about someone getting a visa for 7 days. I would like to appeal to European Union and UK government to reconsider their stand on this issue and ease the norms for Indian nationals wanting to travel to Europe as any other British citizen.
attributes.background: As an Indian national with indefinite leave to remain, I have to apply for Schengen visa to travel Europe. Being an avid traveller, I consider this as a deterrent for free movement of tourists on the basis of their nationality rather than their permanent residency.

rejection.details:
The UK Government does not set the price of Schengen visas. The policy on Schengen visas is set by the EU.

You could start a petition asking for the UK Government to encourage the EU to make the changes you would like to see.
